verbose_text: To assess the effects of srl overexpression in tko 25t mutant flies and heterozygous controls, we first measured the extent of overexpression using qRT-PCR, after combining the relevant chromosomes carrying srl GR, UAS-srl, the ubiquitously acting daGAL4 driver, the tko 25t mutation and appropriate balancer chromosomes (XREF_FIG).
